directions: [["Fry sausage and beef until brown, drain and remove from pan."],["Fry onions, garlic, and mushrooms in olive oil until onions are transparent. "],["Add meat, tomato sauce, wine, diced tomatoes, herbs, and spices."],["Simmer for approximately 30 minutes. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes:
Italian seasonings are simply a mixture of oregano, basil, marjoram, sage, etc. Pre-made mixtures can be purchased at the store. 

Crushed red pepper flakes are another recommended addition.
